messages.title: KEEP TRAFFIC MOVING
messages.content: Labour run Southwark Council continues to make people's transport journeys longer by excessive road works and a disregard for car ownership.

messages.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR VOTE
messages.content: Do you want Miliband, with more borrowing, more tax, and more debt? Or do you want Cameron, whose tough, careful decisions made Britain the fastest which is growing economy in the G7?

messages.title: ABOUT JP FLORU
messages.content: I have lived and worked in central London for more than 20 years. Trained as a solicitor. Set up and ran my own art business for ten years. Published author of two books on political history. I live with my cat, Mischief.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to keep traffic flowing, fight for commuters' rights, improve conditions for cyclists, and lift libellous regulations so companies invest in 4g for SE16.

issues.economy: Don't waste your vote on Miliband, who will bring more borrowing, more tax, and more debt. Instead, choose Cameron, who led Britain to become the fastest-growing economy in the G7.
issues.governance: Do you support Labour's uncosted spending commitments and secret tax rises or do you want the Conservatives who delivers the tax cuts so you can decide your own future?
issues.socialWelfare: Do you support Labour's uncosted spending commitments and secret tax rises or do you want the Conservatives who delivers the tax cuts so you can decide your own future?

leaflet.personalStatement: I live with my cat, Mischief.

politicalExperience.achievements: Published author of two books on political history.
